postMessageAppSend.description: broadcasts a message to all users of a push enabled app

parameters.override: optional, a flag to indicate that the contact is to receive the messageText as provided instead of the message's original text
parameters.messageText: required when override is true, the text value to be used in place of the message's original text
parameters.sendTime: optional, a date formatted yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm specifying a time in the future to send the message
parameters.blackoutWindow: optional, a blackout window definition used to delay message sending outside a given windowStart and windowEnd and utcOffset
parameters.sound: optional, a sound filename to be played on the device
parameters.badge: optional, a value or increment/decrement for the device
parameters.openDirect: optional, a value used as the open direct destination
parameters.customPayload: optional, custom payload definition in escaped JSON
parameters.customKeys: optional, an array of key/value pairs used as custom keys to be sent with the message payload
parameters.title: optional, the title for the message for use on wearables
parameters.subtitle: optional, the subtitle for the message
parameters.media: optional, the section for rich-media information
parameters.replaceInboxMessage: optional, a flag to indicate that Inbox messages with the same MessageId should be replaced (default is true)

parameters.media: optional, the section for rich-media information
parameters.replaceInboxMessage: optional, a flag to indicate that Inbox messages with the same MessageId should be replaced (default is true)

getMessageAppDeliveries.description: retrieves delivery status of a previous messageApp send job

postMessageContactSend.description: sends a message to the specified mobile devices of a push enabled app

parameters.deviceTokens: required if subscriberKeys are not set, the device tokens of the mobile devices that will receive the message
parameters.subscriberKeys: required if deviceTokens are not set, the subscriber keys of the mobile devices that will receive the message
parameters.override: optional, a flag to indicate that the contact is to receive the messageText as provided instead of the message's original text
parameters.messageText: required when override is true, the text value to be used in place of the message's original text
parameters.sendTime: optional, a date formatted yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm specifying a time in the future to send the message
parameters.blackoutWindow: optional, a blackout window definition used to delay message sending outside a given windowStart and windowEnd and utcOffset
parameters.sound: optional, a sound filename to be played on the device
parameters.badge: optional, a value or increment/decrement for the device
parameters.openDirect: optional, a value used as the open direct destination
parameters.customPayload: optional, custom payload definition in escaped JSON
parameters.customKeys: optional, an array of key/value pairs used as custom keys to be sent with the message payload
parameters.title: optional, the title for the message for use on wearables
parameters.subtitle: optional, the subtitle for the message
parameters.media: optional, the section for rich-media information
parameters.replaceInboxMessage: optional, a flag to indicate that Inbox messages with the same MessageId should be replaced (default is true)

postMessageTagSend.description: sends a push message to users with the specified tags

parameters.inclusionTags: required, the device tokens of the mobile devices that will receive the message
parameters.exclusionTags: required, the device tokens of the mobile devices that will not receive the message
parameters.override: optional, a flag to indicate that the contact is to receive the messageText as provided instead of the message's original text
parameters.messageText: required when override is true, the text value to be used in place of the message's original text
parameters.sendTime: optional, a date formatted yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm specifying a time in the future to send the message
parameters.blackoutWindow: optional, a blackout window definition used to delay message sending outside a given windowStart and windowEnd and utcOffset

parameters.subtitle: optional, the subtitle for the message
parameters.media: optional, the section for rich-media information

postMessageListSend.description: sends a message to the specified mobile devices of a push enabled app

parameters.exclusionListIds: optional, an array of one or more contact list ids to exclude in send
parameters.override: optional, a flag to indicate that the contact is to receive the messageText as provided instead of the message's original text
parameters.messageText: required when override is true, the text value to be used in place of the message's original text
parameters.sendTime: optional, a date formatted yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm specifying a time in the future to send the message
parameters.blackoutWindow: optional, a blackout window definition used to delay message sending outside a given windowStart and windowEnd and utcOffset

parameters.subtitle: optional, the subtitle for the message
parameters.media: optional, the section for rich-media information
parameters.replaceInboxMessage: optional, a flag to indicate that Inbox messages with the same MessageId should be replaced (default is true)

getMessageListDeliveries.description: retrieves delivery status of a previous messageList send job

postMessageBatchSend.description: batch send of unique messages to specified device token or subscriber keys

parameters.listId: the id of the list to refresh

getPushApplicationCollection.description: retrieves a list of push applications

getPushApplicationKeyCollection.description: retrieves a list of custom keys for a push application

putPushApplicationKeyCollection.description: replaces a key collection for a push application

deletePushApplicationKeyCollection.description: deletes all keys for a push application

putPushApplicationKey.description: updates an existing key associated with a push application

deletePushApplicationKey.description: deletes a key from a push application

getPushMessageCollection.description: retrieves a list of push messages

getPushMessageJourneys.description: Gets a list of active Journeys for a given message.

postPushMessageApp.description: Create and send a push message to all users

postPushMessageAppWithId.description: Send a push message to all users

postPushMessageContact.description: Create and send a push message to specific contacts

postPushMessageContactWithId.description: Send a push message to specific contacts

postPushMessageList.description: Create and send a push message to audiences

postPushMessageListWithId.description: Send a push message to audiences

postPushMessageTag.description: Create and send a push message to tags

postPushMessageTagWithId.description: Send a push message to tags
